string.name: name
string.value: A Second Gift for the Dragon Master
When you reach Lvl. 50, #p9010010# starts talking to you...
#b#p9010010##k congratulates you for reaching Lv. 50 and asks that you come see her so that she can give you a scroll that can be used.
You received a scroll from #p9010010#. She says she will give you another scroll if you reach Lv. 60 by #bMay 5#k.

Wow! Evan, you've already reached Lv. 50? That was much faster than I expected! In that case, let me give you the scroll that can be used on the Dragon Glasses as I promised before. Be sure to come see me!
You do know where I am right? Just come to a town. I'm always here.
Hmm. You're not implying that you don't like the gift that I, #p9010010#, prepared for you, right?
You've come! My, you really have grown! And the Dragon also looks nothing like it used to. Although, it's still really cute...
Now, let me give you the gift that I've prepared. It's a scroll that can only be used on a Dragon Glasses. I made it myself, of course.

Hehehe... Acutally, this isn't #bthe end#k of my scrolls. I'm never cheap with my gifts! I can give it to you now, but that'd be no fun. Get to #bLv. 60 before May 5#k this time. I will give you another scroll that you can use on the #t1022097#.
